page.title: 19Marldon.Sun Valley Nursery.
page.content: {Sun Valley}nursery was bought in 1979 by Mr and Mrs Templeman.They sell most of their flowers and plants in autumn and spring. They sell less of their plants in the winter. Their sons do not work on the nursery a lot. They spend approximately Â£5000 a year. They are going to expand the nursery in the near future. Mrs.Templeman's favourite flowers are roses and carnations. They buy cuttings, seeds, peat,pots and polythene with the money they get each year. Mr.Templeman does not know if his children will take over. The nursery is at Farthing Cross .it started in a field about 10 years ago,with polythene tunnels.These were damaged by gales.The owners put up timber wind barriers to stop this happening again.
